# ChangeLog

## v4.3.5
* Fix ddconfig is not been initialized yet in some app's unit test

## v4.3.4
* Add type definition for requestIsWebView
* Migrate to tsd
* https://github.corp.ebay.com/nodejs/device-detection-ebay/pull/46

## v4.3.3
* dds V3 API support re enable
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4537

## v4.3.2
* dds V3 API support rollback due to memory leak
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4537

## v4.3.1
* dds V3 API support
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-4537

## v4.2.0
* Typescript update
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3634

## v4.1.5
* Added: Support for ClientHints
https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3091

## v4.1.2
* Added: Ability to Disable DDS per route

## v4.1.1
* Switch short vip to long vip

## v4.1.0
* Added isNative() similar to Java util

## v4.0.7
* PHX exit: sandbox endpoint hasb been corrected

## v4.0.6
* PHX exit: update QA endpoints to non-colo specific endpoints

## v4.0.5
* Removed explicitly defined discovery instrument

## v4.0.4
* Updated requestIsWebView to look for 'trackingApp' query param

## v4.0.3
* Added urn for service-discovery

## v4.0.2
* Fix: Uninitialized cache in when getDeviceInfo is invoked directly instead of going through middleware.

## v4.0.1
* Use UserAgent from req.ebay instead of req. Service applications receive user agent through end-user-context
* using req.ebay.getUserAgent isolate device-detection from having know if it is service or web application.

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

## v1.1.0
* Use userPrefersDesktopExperience property of EndUserContect to detect FSOM preference

## v1.0.9
* Added sandbox url

## v1.0.8
* Fix: fallback now returns isSmall and isLarge

## v1.0.7
* Small optimizations: should not concatenate strings when debug is not enabled

## v1.0.6
* removed unused dependencies

## v1.0.5
* Updated dependencies

## v1.0.4
* Updated Readme
* Updated test cases for DeviceClassification
* Enhanced Property for WebView Property

## v1.0.3
* Changed module-config-inc dependency from fixed to compatible form to avoid duplication.

## v1.0.2
* Enhacement: Switched to `@ebay/service-client-ebay` module to handle better support for service markup / markdown capabilities.

## v1.0.1
* Enhancement to support isFSOM redirect identifier
